title: List of champions that actually do need a new skin(desperately)

replies.body: {{champion:131}} released in 2012 only has 2 skins, bae needs love {{item:3070}}
Yeah, especially since she's being played again.

Lissandra was release two years ago in April. She has two skins, Bloodstone and Blade Queen, and is a fairly under-rated champion. She is rumored to be the sister of Ashe and Sejuani as the three Queens of the Freljord. She really deserves a skin because on the Wiki page it talks about how she rewrote all the stories from the Freljord and she doesn't even have a skin related to the Freljord except her normal skin. She at least deserves a skin like "Redeemed Lissandra" or "Frost Queen Lissandra"

> [{quoted}](name=ImortalLyfe,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Eq3F7NQl,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-10-11T21:31:47.040+0000)
>
> Lissandra was release two years ago in April. She has two skins, Bloodstone and Blade Queen, and is a fairly under-rated champion. She is rumored to be the sister of Ashe and Sejuani as the three Queens of the Freljord. She really deserves a skin because on the Wiki page it talks about how she rewrote all the stories from the Freljord and she doesn't even have a skin related to the Freljord except her normal skin. She at least deserves a skin like "Redeemed Lissandra" or "Frost Queen Lissandra"

I have blade queen and love it, but I'd really like a lore skin like Frost Queen Liss showing what she'd look like if she took over the Freljord. A "what if she wasn't evil" skin like arclight or justicar would be awesome, too - there's a lot of possibilities for her, and lots of room for new skins.
idc what any of you say but {{champion:91}} needs a real new skin

How could you forget Azir?
He's like the new Zac lol
I was looking at old champions, not new ones.

> [{quoted}](name=Justicar Reborn,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Eq3F7NQl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-09T00:34:29.310+0000)
>
> {{champion:14}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:3}}

jax just got his Warden skin, Galio got Debonair and Irelia got OotL earlier this year
FOR THE LOVE OF GOD RIOT {{champion:18}}.
